scripts.build: npm run build:en && npm run build:pl
scripts.build:pl: cd client && ng build --configuration production --prod --deploy-url=static/pl/ --i18n-file src/locale/messages.pl.xlf --i18n-format xlf --i18n-locale pl --outputPath dist/pl
scripts.build:en: cd client && ng build --configuration production --prod --deploy-url=static/en/ --i18n-locale en --outputPath dist/en
scripts.release:package: npm run release:clean && npm run release:copy-server && npm run release:copy-spec && npm run build && npm run release:copy-client
